Dear Prof. Goodwin,

is it possible to calculate the laminar flame speed ? As far as I know
I have to make the "burner stabilized one-dimensional flame"
adiabatic, set the temperature fixed somewhere in the flow and search
for the mass flux instead of fixing it. How "boundaries1d.cpp" must be
modified to implement such a "freely propagating flame" ? 

ulf
